desc.en: Melbourne is the capital of the Australian state of Victoria, and the second-most populous city in Australia. The carrier of its public transport system is Public Transport Victoria (PTV), managing  metro train, tram, metro/regional bus, regional train, coach, ferry and SkyBus. Its gauges are majorly 1600mm, except the route between Seymour and Albury (NSW) is 1435mm.

updateHistory.reason: Change wrong spelling of melbourne central
